page.title: 18CHANGES TO CLUTTON SCHOOL
page.content: There have been two main changes to the schoolthis year. {The new building} On Thursday 12th June a new building was delivered.It came in three large sections which were delivered on the back of a lorry and the road had to be closed. A land rover used a pulley and a set of wheels to manoeuvre the sections through the gates and behind the school. It was then put together. This took two days. We now have a new Headteacher's office, a staffroom and a store room.{ { The conservation area } Part of the school grounds has been turned into a conservation area. We have put in a deep pond and a frog has already come to live there.We have some large tadpoles.White orchids, camomile and tall thistles are growing and butterflies have come.
